pages.text: The $(item)Skewer$() is a very simple machine for killing creatures; when it receives a redstone signal, sharp metal spikes will extend out of it. Creatures that fall into or walk into the spikes will take damage.$(p)The Skewer can also be used to collect blood from creatures, into a $(l:summoning/quantity)Blood Crystal$().

pages.title: Basic Upgrades
pages.text: $(li)$(item)Nether Quartz$(0) - Damage$(li)$(item)Spider Eyes$(0) - Poison$(li)$(item)Redstone Torch$(0) - Extend$(p)Notes on advanced upgrades for the Skewer will be revealed as the Restoration of Animalia progresses.
